alert.note: Alert for Southern Bristol; Southern Plymouth (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued January 24 at 2:28PM EST until January 26 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by rain and snowmelt is possible. * WHERE...Rhode Island and southeastern portions of Massachusetts. * WHEN...From Wednesday evening through Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - A period of heavy rain combined with snowmelt Wednesday night into Thursday morning may cause street and poor drainage flooding along with rises on area rivers, creeks and streams. Localized flooding also will be favored where heavy rain falls on clogged storm drains. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
